name:
Scenario: Add products to the shopping cart
Given: User is on the home page
When: User hovers over 'Living'
And: User clicks 'Sofa'
And: User clicks 'Conrad Sofa'
And: User scrolls down to 'Add to Cart'
And: User clicks 'PREDICTED DELIVERY TIME'
And: User selects 'Dhaka' as the location
And: User selects 'Uttara' as the nearest showroom
And: User selects 'PU Rexine' as the material
And: User selects 'Standard Size'
And: User sets the quantity to '2'
Then: User clicks 'Add to Cart'
And: User clicks 'View Cart'
